Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Alright, I have to hand it to you again, stellar idea on an official train station.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: The quality and timeliness is breathtaking! No more of that dinky little wooden platform.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Go check it out when you get a chance.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Ohh right, I found two stern but loyal pups for some security around here. Not long until they set up their station.

Nodes.name: Tortimer
Nodes.text: Until then, I'll let you get back to work. Don't push yourself too hard.
